index.name: Hi I'm {name} {prononciation}
index.baseline: üçï I like pizza and I develop strong websites and applications for good.
index.heading: Senior JavaScript developer from Nantes, France
index.contactMeButton.label: Contact me
index.ikigai.title: Convinced by software craftsmanship, I give birth to projects that make the world a better place
index.ikigai.content: As an actor of the IT economy, I use my expertise on projects that have a positive impact on their environment and put human beings as the central point of the design process.
index.posts.title: Recent blog posts
index.services.title: How can I help you?
index.services.baseline: Your project is unique. It deserves an attentive listening before rushing into it.
index.services.1.title: Website development
index.services.1.details: Investing into clean code is the best way to reduce time-to-market and maintenance costs. I use JavaScript, React and React Native with the mindset that my work must be reusable and create smooth experience for both users and developers.
index.services.2.title: Agile project management
index.services.2.details: From needs analysis to strategic advices, passing by writing functional or technical specifications. Agile methodologies and tools borrowed to Design Thinking are perfect to put your target in the center of the design process.
index.services.3.title: SEO optimization
index.services.3.details: Make your activity visible on the internet by building a website around SEO best practices. Because I search to be up to date with the latest innovations in this field, I am able to setup a SEO strategy to optimize your natural indexing.
index.services.4.title: JavaScript and ReactJS training
index.services.4.details: I believe that knowledge is a treasure that has to be distributed with the many. That's why I like to share my expertise, from the beginners who whant to learn coding basics, to the advanced levels thant need to setup architectural strategies in complex applications.
index.caseStudies.title: Latest projets I worked on
index.testimonials.title: Testimonials
index.contact.title: ‚òïÔ∏è Let's have coffee
index.contact.desc: If you're in Nantes, I would be happy to share a cup of coffee and talk about your project.
index.contact.desc.remote: I can also work from anywhere and I would be pleased to develop your project even if we're not living in the same location.
